name: Battlechat
description:
Battlechat is a 2D multiplayer game for Twitch streamers where their followers can compete against each other with just simple commands via chat on different maps.
As a player you can...
  • control your character through the grid of the different maps.
  • place bombs to get rid of your opponents.
  • get stronger by collecting different powerups.
Increases the radius of your explosions.
Move faster through the map.
Reduce explosion delay, make sure you're not around when it happens.
Careful! You will lose a life if you touch it.

As Twitch streamer you can...
  • join the game and compete against your followers.
  • manage and control the game by placing 'powerups'.
  • both. why not?
  • set a maximum number of players.
  • set game time.

Just make sure you stream everything.
